
##### Contents #####

# V2ME Dismantlement by Bob Bobington & Dr, Configured for GFM

# ID Groups:
#	0400-0409				Configuration & Trigger Events 
#	0410-0419				First Wave Bounce Events (Ai)
#	0420-0429 & 0800-0899 	Dismantlement Leader Decision Events
#	0430-0439				Second Wave Bounce Events (Ai)
#	0440-0449				Primary Effect Bouncing Events
#	0450-0479				Primary Victor Response Events
#	0480-0489				Secondary First Wave Bounce Events (Ai)
#	0490-0499				Secondary Victor Leading Decision Events
#	0500-0509				Secondary Second Wave Bounce Events (Ai)
#	0510-0519				Secondary Effect Bouncing Evenets
#	0520-0549				Secondary Victor Response Events
#	0550-0559				Effect Events
#	1100-1199 & 1200-1299	Custom Formables Bounce Events & Puppet Custom Formables Bounce Events
#	1300-1399 & 1400-1499	Custom Formables Decision Events & Puppet Formables Decision Events
#

##### 0400-0409	Configuration & Trigger Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770403
    title = "The $CAPITAL$ Conference has been called!"
    desc = "This decision is to inform you the following events will allow you to dismantle recent enemies."
	picture = "Dismantle 2"
	major = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		#sets defeated value for newly defeated countries
		
		set_global_flag = waiting_for_dismantlement_setup
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				has_country_flag = Major_Defeated
			}
			clr_country_flag = Major_Defeated
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 1 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 2 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 3.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 3 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 3.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 4.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 4 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 4.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 5.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 5 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 5.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 6.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 6 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 6.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 7.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 7 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 7.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 8.99 } } } }
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 8 } set_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0 } }
			}
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				alliance_with = THIS
				is_greater_power = yes
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 0.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 1.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 1 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 0.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 1.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 1 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 0.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 1.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 1 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 1.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 2.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 2 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 1.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 2.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 2 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 1.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 2.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 2 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 2.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 3.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 3.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 3.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 3 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 2.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 3.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 3.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 3.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 3 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow value = 0 }
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 2.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 3.99 } }
						THIS = {

				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 7.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 8.99 } }
						THIS = {
							check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 7.99 }
							NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 8.99 } }
						}
						NOT = {
							war_countries = {
								check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 7.99 }
								NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 8.99 } }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 8 }
					set_variable = { which = potential_conference_member_overflow_two value = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		
		clr_global_flag = waiting_for_dismantlement_setup
		clr_country_flag = dismantlement_event_delivered
		
		#sets conference value for current country
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 } }
					NOT = { war_countries = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 0.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } } } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_variable = { which = conference value = 1 }
				set_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0 }
				set_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_1
				set_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 1 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 1.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 } }
					NOT = { war_countries = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 1.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } } } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_variable = { which = conference value = 2 }
				set_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 0 }
				set_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_2
				set_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 2 }
			}
		}

				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = dismantlement_leader value = 2.99 }

					NOT = { war_countries = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = target_of_dismantlement value = 3.99 } } } }

						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_4
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_5
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_6
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_7
						NOT = { has_global_flag = victor_chosen_8 }
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 6.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 7.99 } }
					}
				}
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 7 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_2
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_3
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_4
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_5
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_6
						has_global_flag = victor_chosen_7
						NOT = { has_global_flag = victor_chosen_8 }
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 7.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 8.99 } }
					}
				}
				owner = { set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 8 } }
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_2 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_3 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_4 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_5 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_6 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_7 }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 } } }
				owner = { set_global_flag = victor_chosen_8 }
			}
		}
		
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_2
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_3
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_4
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_5
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_6
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_7
		clr_global_flag = victor_chosen_8
		
		#set total number of victors for this conference
		
		set_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 1 }
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { tag = THIS }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 1 } }
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 0.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 1.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 1.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 2.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 2.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 3.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 3.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 4.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 4.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 5.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 5.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 6.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 6.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 7.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 7.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 8.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				set_global_flag = Total_Eight_Victor
			}
		}
		
        random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 0.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 1.99 } }
					}
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 1.99 } }
				}
				country_event = 777770406
			}
		}
		
		random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 1.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 2.99 } }
					}
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 1.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 2.99 } }
				}
				country_event = 777770406
			}
		}
		
		random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 2.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 3.99 } }
					}
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 2.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 3.99 } }
				}
				country_event = 777770406
			}
		}
		
		random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {

						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 4.99 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 4.99 } }
				}

			}
		}
		
		random_country = {

				limit = {

						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 5.99 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 5.99 } }

			}
		}

			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 5.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 6.99 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 6.99 } }

			}
		}
		
		random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 6.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 7.99 } }

					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 7.99 } }

		}
		
		random_country = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					THIS = {
						check_variable = { which = conference value = 7.99 }
						NOT = { check_variable = { which = conference value = 8.99 } }
					}
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 7.99 }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 8.99 } }
				}
				country_event = 777770406
			}
		}
		
    }
}

### Trigger Event 406 ###

country_event = {
    id = 777770406
    title = "How we are to be treated in defeat must now be considered"
    desc = "We will now be dismantled."
	picture = "Dismantle 9"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
#
#	##### Cleanup Chain Trigger #####
#
		CLN = { country_event = 777770407 } #country_event = 4778747 possible to be removed now?
    }
}

country_event = {
	id = 777770407
	title = "AI: Dismantlement Setup"
	desc = "AI: Dismantlement Setup"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		#return cores to victors
		
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			set_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 10 }
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						mass_politics = 1
					}
				}
				owner = { change_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 1 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						in_default = yes
					}
				}
				owner = { change_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = -4 } }
			}

				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = { total_amount_of_ships = 10 }
					}
				}

					owner = {

					}

				}
			}
			set_country_flag = colonial_zone_exclusion
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				any_core = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
							overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = { overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } } }
				exists = yes
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Core_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
			}
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		}

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_vassal = yes
					is_substate = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
			}
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 }
		}

		any_country = {
			limit = {
				any_core = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
							overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
						}
					}
				}
				exists = no
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
			}
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "GG go next"
		CLN = { country_event = 777770408 }
	}
}

#staggers the dismantlement events so they don't all spam out at once
country_event = {
	id = 777770408
	title = "AI: Dismantlement Event Trigger"
	desc = "AI: Dismantlement Event Trigger"
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "Trigger Events"
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 } }
			}
			THIS = { clr_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup set_country_flag = clear_secondaries set_country_flag = clear_modifiers }
			clr_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = clear_modifiers } }
			owner = {
				any_country = {
					clr_country_flag = common_government_bonus
					clr_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty
					clr_country_flag = infamous_penalty
					clr_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty
					clr_country_flag = recent_state_bonus
					clr_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus
					clr_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty
				}
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = clear_secondaries } }
			owner = {
				clr_country_flag = clear_secondaries
				any_country = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0 }
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = too_many_deliveries
#
#		existing cores
#
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				any_core = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
							overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
						}
					}
				}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } } }
				exists = yes
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Core_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 }
				NOT = {
					has_country_flag = colonial_zone_exclusion
				}
			}
			country_event = 777770412
			set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
			set_variable = { which = Core_Event_Sent value = 1 }
			CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
		}

#		puppet union events

#		FAR EASTERN REPUBLIC PUPPET EVENT
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_vassal = yes
					is_substate = yes
				}
				OR = {
					tag = YAK
					tag = BRY
					tag = KAM
					tag = GUK
				}
				overlord = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 }
			}
			country_event = 777771200
			set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 1 }
			CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
		}

			limit = {

					is_vassal = yes

				}
				OR = {

				NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 }
			}
			country_event = 777771217
			set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 1 }
			CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
		}
#		CENTRAL AMERICA PUPPET EVENT
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_vassal = yes
					is_substate = yes
				}
				OR = {
					tag = NIC
					tag = NCC
					tag = PNM
					tag = HON
					tag = GUA
					tag = ELS
					tag = COS
					tag = TRS

				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }

#		Base Event for puppets - MUST COME AFTER PUPPET UNION EVENTS
#
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					is_vassal = yes
					is_substate = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 }
			}
			country_event = 777770411
			set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Event_Sent value = 1 }
			CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
		}

#		non-existing union events

#		FAR EASTERN REPUBLIC CORE EVENT
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				any_core = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
							overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
						}
					}
				}
				exists = no
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 }
				OR = {
					tag = YAK
					tag = BRY
					tag = KAM
					tag = GUK
				}
			}
			country_event = 777771100
			set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
			CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
		}

#
#		Colonial Targeting
#
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1725
						province_id = 1726
						province_id = 1727
						province_id = 1728
						province_id = 1729
						province_id = 1730
					}
				}
				TUN = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = check_complete }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Colony_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			TUN = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 } }
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
					TUN = { check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				TUN = {
					set_country_flag = check_complete
					country_event = 777770610
					set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
					CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
				}
			}
		}

#		GABON
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1976
						province_id = 1972
						province_id = 1975
						province_id = 1974
					}
				}

					NOT = { has_country_flag = check_complete }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Colony_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			GAB = {
				set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 }
			}
		}

			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }

					set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
					CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
				}
			}
		}
#       NAMIBIA
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					overlord = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
				}
				any_owned_province = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2086
						province_id = 2084
						province_id = 2085
						province_id = 2078
						province_id = 2079
						province_id = 2083
						province_id = 2082
						province_id = 2080
						province_id = 2081
					}
				}
				NMB = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = check_complete }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Colony_Event_Sent value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = part_of_conference value = 0.99 } }
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			NMB = {
				set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 1 }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					NOT = { THIS = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
					NMB = { check_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
			owner = {
				NMB = {
					set_country_flag = check_complete
					country_event = 777770610 
					set_country_flag = mail_delivery_opened
					CLN = { set_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup }
				}
			}
		}

		#cleans up after the conference is over
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } }
			owner = { CLN = { country_event = { id = 777770408 days = 1 } } }
		}
		
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = mail_delivery_ready_for_pickup } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_1 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_1 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_2 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_2 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_3 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_3 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_4 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_4 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_5 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_5 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_6 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_6 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_7 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_7 }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { has_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_8 } }
					owner = { clr_global_flag = conference_8 }
				}
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_1
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_2
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_3
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_4
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_5
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_6
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_7
				clr_global_flag = Dismantlement_Underway_8
				clr_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor
				clr_global_flag = Total_Eight_Victor
				any_country = {
					set_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = conference value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0 }

					set_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = conference_victors value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Existing_Apathy value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0 }
					set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0 }

##### 0410-0419	First Wave Bounce Events (Ai) #####


country_event = {
    id = 777770410
	#no pic needed
    title = "Is this what freedom feels like?"
    desc = "Our freedom is being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770802
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770426
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770420
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770805
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770429
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770423
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770411
    title = "We may be give independence from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our puppethood by $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ is under review."
	picture = "Dismantle 4"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770803
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }

country_event = {
    id = 777770412
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"

	picture = "Dismantle 6"
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }

			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}

##### 0420-0429 & 0800-0899 Dismantlement Leader Decision Events  #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770420
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "Dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
#	Set Probability Variables	
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = 15
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770421
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 1"

		any_country = {
			limit = {

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }

			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770422
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "Lands claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$ are present in the defeated state, should we demand these are returned?"
	picture = "Dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770423
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "Dismantle 13"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.005 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770424
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {

				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}

    }

        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"

			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
