			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770425
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "Lands claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$ are present in the defeated state, should we demand these are returned?"
	picture = "Dismantle 25"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }

country_event = {
    id = 777770426
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "Dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
#	Set Probability Variables	
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = 15
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {

				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }

				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}

			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"

			country_event = 777770430	
		}

            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }

			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"

			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770427
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 1"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
#	Set Probability Variables	
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"

		}

			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }

country_event = {
    id = 777770428
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "Lands claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$ are present in the defeated state, should we demand these are returned?"
	picture = "Dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

#		No option to ask other victors if 1 victor

country_event = {
    id = 777770429
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "Dismantle 13"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770800
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770801
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"

			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770802
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "Dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
#	Set Probability Variables	
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = 15
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770803
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 1"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
#	Set Probability Variables	
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770804
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"

	picture = "Dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

			}

		}

			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }

			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }

        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"

			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }

		}

country_event = {
    id = 777770805
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"

			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}

    }

        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"

			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }

		}

        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770806
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "Dismantle 14"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770807
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$ cores?"
    desc = "Lands claimed by $FROMCOUNTRY$ are present in the defeated state, should we demand these are returned?"
	picture = "dismantle 22"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ cores shall take priority (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall have cores from remaining lands"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 3
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 3 alliance_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall not grow larger"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Existing_As_Is value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770432
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 50 war_with = FROM }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

##### 0440-0449	Primary Effect Bouncing Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770440
    title = "Our freedom is being considered?"
    desc = "Our freedom is being considered by the Conference Chair!"
	picture = "Dismantle 11"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor	
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Eight_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770450
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Third_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770450
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770450
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
			}

		}

			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770450
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Six_Victor }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			country_event = 777770450
		}

				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Two_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Three_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {

				has_global_flag = Total_Four_Victor

			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {

				has_global_flag = Total_Five_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}

			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Seven_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } 
				has_global_flag = Total_Eight_Victor
				ai = yes
			}
			country_event = 777770550
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { check_variable = { which = Existing_Chomp value = 0.99 } }
				check_variable = { which = Second_Victor value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
			}
			country_event = 777770474
