##### 0450-0479	Primary Victor Response Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777770450
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair wishes to create a $FROMCOUNTRY$. The proposal overwrites current plans, How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 11"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to exist!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430

			}

			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }

    }

			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770452
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair does not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$. Should we propose our own plans?"
	picture = "dismantle 25"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "No, We also dont care about $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
		name = "We suggest our own plans for $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		badboy = 0.1
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 0 }
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777770480
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

    id = 777770453
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair as rejected independence for $FROMCOUNTRY$. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }

        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not exist!"

			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}

		}

			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430

				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be thiers!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ deserves something else!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770455
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair wishes to puppet $FROMCOUNTRY$. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}

		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ should be thier puppet!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20

		}

				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {

			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

				tag = FROM

			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, this could be to strong!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770460
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair wishes to free $FROMCOUNTRY$ from puppethood. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 12"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be free!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should not have been allowed to be free!"

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }

				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431

    id = 777770462
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair doesnt give a damn about $FROMCOUNTRY$. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 1"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$ either."
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We have our own plans for $FROMCOUNTRY$!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 0 }
		}
		set_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 1 }
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770481
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770463
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chair wishes to leave $FROMCOUNTRY$ as a puppet. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 5"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be as is!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		create_alliance = FROM
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We disagree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should have been free!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = -50
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = FROM
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 50
			}
		}
		badboy = 0.1
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Eighth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Seventh_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Sixth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fifth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Fourth_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Third_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 0.99 } } }
				tag = FROM
			}
			set_variable = { which = Second_Victor_Complete value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

country_event = {
    id = 777770464
    title = "What is our stance on $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The Conference Chairs wishes to annex $FROMCOUNTRY$. How do we respond?"
	picture = "dismantle 20"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}

				tag = FROM

					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "We agree, $FROMCOUNTRY$ Should be eaten!"
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
			}
			relation = {
				who = THIS
				value = 20
			}
		}
