				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = no }
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Secondary_Claim value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { OR = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			inherit = FROM
			set_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				FROM = { OR = { check_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 0.99 } check_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 0.99 } } }
			}
			inherit = FROM
		}
		clr_global_flag = stop_right_there_criminal_scum
		FROM = { set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 } }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777770557
    title = "Integration from Dismantlement"
    desc = "We are to form a larger state!"
	picture = "Dismantle 7"
    is_triggered_only = yes
    option = {
        name = "whoop whoop not chungus"
        any_country = {
            limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }
				}
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = yes }
				OR = {
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 0.99 } }
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_Two value = 0.99 } }
				}
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = yes }
        }
		any_country = {
            limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
                exists = yes
                FROM = { exists = no civilized = no }
				OR = {
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 0.99 } }
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_Two value = 0.99 } }
				}
            }
            release = FROM
			FROM = { civilized = no }
        }
        any_country = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }	
					check_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 0.99 }					
				}
				OR = {
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 0.99 } }
					FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_Two value = 0.99 } }
				}
			}
            any_owned = { limit = { is_core = FROM } secede_province = THIS add_core = UTI }
        }
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = yes } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = yes }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { civilized = no } } }
			owner = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = UTI
					}
					secede_province = FROM
					remove_core = UTI
				}
				FROM = { civilized = no }
			}
		}
		random_owned = {
			limit = { owner = { FROM = { check_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_Two value = 0.99 } } } }
			owner = {
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { FROM = { tag = HAW } } }
					owner = { PAC = { inherit = FROM set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 } } }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { FROM = { tag = ROM } } }
					owner = { HUR = { inherit = FROM set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 } } }
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { owner = { FROM = { tag = LIT } } }
					owner = { PLR = { inherit = FROM set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 } } }
				}
			}
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { 
					OR = {
						tag = YAK
						tag = BRY
						tag = KAM
						tag = GUK
					}
				}
			}
			FER = { set_variable = { which = Rewritable_State value = 1 } }
			FER = { inherit = FROM }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = {
					OR = {
						tag = ORA

					}

			}

##### 1100-1199 & 1200-1299  Custom Formables Bounce Events & Puppet Custom Formables Bounce Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777771100
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772600
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772200
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771300
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772800
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772400
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772000
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771200
    title = "We may be freed by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772700
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772300
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771400
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772900
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772500
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772100
		}
    }

				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772103
		}
    }

country_event = {
    id = 777771104
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772604
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772204
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }

			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771304

				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }

    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772706
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772306
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771406
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772906
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772506
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772106
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771107
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772607
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772207
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771307
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772807
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772407
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772007
		}
    }
}

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772209
		}

country_event = {
    id = 777771209
    title = "We may be freed by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772709
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772309
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771409
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772909
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772509
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772109
		}
    } 
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771110
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }

			limit = {

				}
			}

				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }

			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }

		}

				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771411
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772911
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772511
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772111
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771112
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772612
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772212
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771312
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772812
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772412
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772012
		}
    }
}

				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772414
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor

country_event = {
    id = 777771115
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772615
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772215

			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771315
		}

				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }

				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}

			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772617
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }

country_event = {
    id = 777771217
    title = "We may be freed by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772717
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772317
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771417
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }

		}

				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772719
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772319
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771419
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772919
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772519
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772119
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771120
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}

    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772620
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772220
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777771320
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772820
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772420
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = too_many_deliveries } }
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			FROM = { set_country_flag = too_many_deliveries }
			THIS = { set_variable = { which = Freedom_Event_Sent value = 1 } }
			country_event = 777772020
		}
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771220
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = core_count value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			THIS = { change_variable = { which = core_count value = 1 } }
		}
		all_core = {
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				THIS = { change_variable = { which = pop_count value = 1 } }
			}
		}
	}
	
    option = {
        name = "Very Well"
		set_variable = { which = Non_Rewritable_State value = 0 }
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772720
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772320
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				NOT = { has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor }
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777771420
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } }
				THIS = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772920
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				OR = { AND = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 2.99 } NOT = { check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 } } }
				THIS = { AND = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 20 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 150 } } } OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772520
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = Dismantlement_Chair value = 0.99 }
				has_global_flag = Total_One_Victor
				check_variable = { which = dismantlement_dollars value = 5.99 }
				THIS = { NOT = { OR = { check_variable = { which = core_count value = 15 } check_variable = { which = pop_count value = 100 } } } }
			}
			country_event = 777772120
		}
    }

country_event = {
    id = 777771221
    title = "We may have our cores returned from $FROMCOUNTRY$ by the current dismantlement!"
    desc = "Our $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ cores are being considered."
    is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {

		set_variable = { which = pop_count value = 0 }

			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					check_variable = { which = Major_Defeated value = 0.99 }
				}
			}

##### 1300-1399 & 1400-1499	Custom Formables Decision Events & Puppet Formables Decision Events #####

country_event = {
    id = 777771300
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 8"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurFreedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join the Far Eastern Republic (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		FER = { create_alliance = FROM }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 FER = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777771400
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 21"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our puppet!B[-3]!" badboy = 2.5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Puppet value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }

			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "The lands of $FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be ours B[-6]!" badboy = 5
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Chomp value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target

country_event = {
    id = 777771301
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 7"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}

		}

		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -6
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0 ai = yes }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be our vassal B[-3]!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_OurVassal value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
		change_variable = {
			which = dismantlement_dollars
			value = -3
		}
		set_country_flag = dismantlement_dollars_target
		CLN = { country_event = 777771700 }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0 FROM = { NOT = { has_country_flag = soft_vassal_overwrite } } }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The Arab Union (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
