			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Pacifica (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PCF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772712
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 3"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Pacifica"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PCF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772613
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The Peru-Bolivian Confederation (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 PBC = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

	picture = "dismantle 7"

				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

		}

    id = 777772614
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 5"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The North German Confederation (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 NGF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772714
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 8"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The North German Confederation"

           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 FER = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 777772615
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 15"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}

			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }

				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"

		}

				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The South German Confederation"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 SGF = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772616
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 23"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Italy (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 ITA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }

country_event = {
    id = 777772716
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 16"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }

			}

		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}

			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Transcaucasia (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 TCA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772717
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 25"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Transcaucasia"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 FER = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772618
    title = "What would you like to do with $FROMCOUNTRY$?"
    desc = "The concept of $FROMCOUNTRY$ is present within the borders of the defeated, should we demand the creation of a $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ state?"
	picture = "dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1

			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join The United States of Central America (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }

			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 UCA = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }

    id = 777772619

    is_triggered_only = yes

			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist (Overwrite new states)"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Overwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall exist"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonOverwrite value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 4
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 4 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "Other Victors can say on $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall stay as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Freedom_NonFreedom value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770430	
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Reorganised China (Overwrite new states)"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Integrate_Union_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770430
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 30
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 RCH = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
}

country_event = {
    id = 777772719
    title = "What should be done with the $FROMCOUNTRY$ puppet state?"
    desc = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ is a puppet regime, should we reorganize their government?"
	picture = "dismantle 17"
	allow_multiple_instances = yes
    is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				OR = { AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = democracy government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism government = hms_government government = constitutional_empire } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship government = parliamentary_republic government = prussian_constitutionalism } } THIS = { OR = { government = proletarian_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } THIS = { OR = { government = presidential_dictatorship government = fascist_dictatorship } } } AND = { FROM = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } THIS = { OR = { government = absolute_monarchy government = absolute_empire government = semi_constitutional_empire } } } }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				badboy = 0.8
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				have_core_in = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				OR = {
					has_recently_lost_war = yes
					is_disarmed = yes
					military_access = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				FROM = { slavery = yes_slavery }
				THIS = { slavery = yes_slavery }
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
		}
		any_country = {
			limit = { 
				tag = FROM
				truce_with = THIS
			}
			THIS = { set_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
		}
		set_country_flag = annex_overwrite
    }
	
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall be independent!"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Freedom value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
		create_alliance = FROM
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 5
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 120 } }
			 
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = holdout_slavery_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "We do not care about $FROMCOUNTRY$"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_Apathy value = 1 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.5 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall remain as it is"
		FROM = {
			set_variable = { which = Puppet_As_Is value = 1 }
			set_variable = { which = Outcome_Required value = 0 }
			country_event = 777770431
		}
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 1 has_country_flag = infamous_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = conflicting_government_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = we_control_core_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 5 has_country_flag = truce_with_this_penalty }
			modifier = { factor = 15 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 1 badboy = 17 }
        }
    }
    option = {
        name = "$FROMCOUNTRY$ shall join Reorganised China"
        FROM = {
           set_variable = { which = Puppet_Integrate_One value = 1 }
           country_event = 777770431
        }
        ai_chance = {
            factor = 20
			modifier = { factor = 3 has_country_flag = common_government_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 5 government = democracy }
			modifier = { factor = 5 relation = { who = FROM value = 199 } }
			modifier = { factor = 4 relation = { who = FROM value = 180 } }
			modifier = { factor = 3 relation = { who = FROM value = 160 } }
			modifier = { factor = 2 relation = { who = FROM value = 140 } }

			modifier = { factor = 2 has_country_flag = recent_state_bonus }
			modifier = { factor = 0.05 badboy = 23 }
			modifier = { factor = 0.75 badboy = 17 }
			modifier = { factor = 100 FER = { exists = yes } }
        }
    }
